name: places/ChIJ6TdhuQ1ZwokRqkJddog_w_s
formattedAddress: 25 Waterside Plaza # 5, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 25 Waterside Plaza # 5, New York, NY 10010-2621, USA

originalText.text: I am a resident at Waterside Plaza.  I called the salon and asked about the cost of a manicure and was told $18.  When I arrived with my daughter, they looked at us up and down and I guess I don't look how I sound, and was told right away I needed an appointment.  I walked out as fast as I walked in.  I know code for "we don't want to do the nails of people of color".  I have never seen a person of color in this nail salon, ever.  I was told by a neighbor that they have walked in without an appointment several times with no problem and that this salon should be thankful to get any kind of business at all, as it is never busy.  I am so disheartened by the blatant racism my daughter and I had to experience, that I am telling all of my neighbor friends and building staff of our experience and to stay away.  This neighborhood has plenty of nail salons.  SHAME ON YOU!!!

originalText.text:
Excellent manicures and arm massage.
My hands went to heaven.

I treated myself today to a back massage after the manicure. Now THAT was heaven.
Amazing what Wendy accomplished, with me fully dressed, just melting into a massage chair, my face into a cushion, totally relaxed…she found some muscles that needed work!

To think I live just across the Plaza and can cut across here to Xia for a few minutes of heaven…
I’m due for a pedicure and leg massage in a couple of weeks….

originalText.text: Staff is very sweet but the service isn't the best - I had a mani pedi that took nearly 2 hours, was pretty expensive and my nails were very thin/cracked easily within less than 2 weeks of the service. They do offer a range of services so it's not a bad option, but there are some significant pitfalls, in my opinion

originalText.text: The salon is newly renovated, the atmosphere is great! Dedicated technicians perform quality work. Prices are reasonable and I always look forward to my appointments there!

text.text: The salon is newly renovated, the atmosphere is great! Dedicated technicians perform quality work. Prices are reasonable and I always look forward to my appointments there!

originalText.text: Really enjoyed the massaged will definitely be coming back!

text.text: Really enjoyed the massaged will definitely be coming back!
